sentences.en: The baby gurgled innocently on the bed.
sentences.cn: 那个婴儿在床上天真地咯咯笑。

sentences.en: "What do you mean?" Annie asked innocently.
sentences.cn: “你这是什么意思？”安妮故作无知地问道。

sentences.en: After a moment's hesitation he looked up innocently and asked, "What was the Great Seal like, my lord?"
sentences.cn: 犹豫了一会儿，他无辜地抬起头问道：“御玺长什么样呢，伯爵？”
